### Document name - AWS-ReleaseElasticIP
  
## What does this document do?
This automation releases the specified Elastic IP address using the allocation ID.  
  
## Input Parameters
* AllocationId: (Required) The Allocation ID of the Elastic IP address.
* AutomationAssumeRole: (Optional) The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM) role that allows Systems Manager Automation to perform the actions on your behalf. If no role is specified, Systems Manager Automation uses the permissions of the user that starts this runbook.

## Output Parameters
* No Outputs

AllocationId.description: (Required) The Allocation ID of the Elastic IP address.

AutomationAssumeRole.description: (Optional) The ARN of the role that allows Automation to perform the actions on your behalf.
